segments.text: This is your first Christmas in the US . Here is the gift for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very thoughtful of you . Wow , it is so beautiful . Could you tell me how American people celebrate Christmas ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . People decorate their houses , place a Christmas tree in the room and maybe sing a Christmas carol together .
segments.speaker: S1
